message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Take this as a friendly start to the game.
A more balanced start to the game, Alice. Your turn to decide.
Let's try to find a middle ground, Bob. This offer is a bit closer to the middle.
Getting closer to the middle, but I'm not quite there yet.
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to go. Let's end this game on a good note.
